title: Compare sound waves to radio waves

content.description: You and a friend are traveling in a car. You tune the car radio to a station of frequency 850 kHz. The graph below represents the electric field strength of the radio wave at a given position as a function of time.
content.question: Both the sound and radio waves are present inside the car. Which of the following is true about these waves?

choices.label: Both waves travel at the speed of light.
Sound waves require a medium in which to propagate and radio waves do not.

content.answer: Sound waves require a medium in which to propagate and radio waves do not.
